| params | (iterable) | Iterable of parameters to optimize or dicts defining parameter groups. |
A deep learning optimizer with reliable convergence. Supports Pytorch and TensorFlow 1 & 2.

installation.excerpt:
Use pip to quickly install Expectigrad:

```
pip install expectigrad
```

Or you can clone this repository and install manually:

```
git clone https://github.com/brett-daley/expectigrad.git
cd expectigrad
python setup.py -e .
```
See installation and usage below to get started.

invocation.excerpt: | name | (str) | Optional name for the operations created when applying gradients. Default: 'Expectigrad' |

long_title.excerpt: Expectigrad: Fast Stochastic Optimization with Robust Convergence Properties

excerpt.body: Initial release of the [Expectigrad optimizer](https://arxiv.org/abs/2010.01356). Supports Pytorch, TensorFlow 1, and TensorFlow 2.
excerpt.name: Initial release

usage.excerpt:
Pytorch and both versions of TensorFlow are supported.
Refer to the code snippets below to instantiate the optimizer for your deep learning framework.
